channel.title: I need help with harrasing players!
channel.description: How do i IP ban a player? i know i need some hamachia stuff (dont know how to spell it) plz help

item.title: I need help with harrasing players!
item.dc:creator: @seekereb seekereb
item.description:
@seekereb wrote:

Adjacent:

go into character files and find the char u want to ip ban and see where it says connectedfrom? copy that now go into data and click bannedips and paste that under the last banned ip (make sure they are logged off) and exit and save =D

i did that and its not working![br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2007, 07:12:38 PM[/size][hr][quote=“seekereb”][quote author=Adjacent link=topic=145423.msg1387251#msg1387251 date=1180332717]
go into character files and find the char u want to ip ban and see where it says connectedfrom? copy that now go into data and click bannedips and paste that under the last banned ip (make sure they are logged off) and exit and save =D
[/quote]

i did that and its not working![/quote]

al;so what happens if their ip dosent go up???
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2007, 07:19:03 PM[/size][hr]plz go to my server and help me

IP - 70.162.108.118
Port - 5555

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with harrasing players!
